name: Lizardfolk Shaman
movement: 30 ft. walking, 15 ft. climbing, 30 ft. swimming
description: The Lizardfolk Shaman is a medium humanoid with green scales, adept at spellcasting and combat. It carries a Ritual Staff and has a notable affinity for poison. This shaman exudes an aura of resilience, amplified by its natural armor.
memorable: Possesses unique abilities like heightened smell and taste for tracking, and can poison attackers with its 'Poisoned Body' ability.
goals: To support its allies through healing spells and control the battlefield with entanglements and poison.
relations: Related to other Lizardfolk and could be encountered with druidic allies or in swamps.
environment: Usually found in swamps and aquatic environments.
strengths: Exceptional Wisdom enhances spellcasting and perception, capable of both dealing and mitigating damage.
weaknesses: While versatile, its attributes are mostly average, making it less effective in direct physical confrontations.
attacks: Utilizes a Multiattack combining a Bite and Ritual Staff swing, or unleashes dangerous Swamp Bolt spells.
most_powerful_ability: Poisoned Body ability that inflicts damage on melee attackers, deterring close combat.
senses: Possesses an impressive perception score of 15, enabling it to detect hidden threats effectively.
skills: Has proficiency in Stealth but is primarily a spellcaster, leveraging its high Wisdom for spells.
additional_information: Can hold breath for 15 minutes, enhancing survivability underwater.
Expert at using its environment for mobility with climbing and swimming abilities.
Can cast control and healing spells, making it crucial in party dynamics.
Bite attack and Ritual Staff attack deal significant damage, especially with poison effects.
Heightened smell provides a unique tracking advantage.
spellcasting: Casts utility and healing spells like druidcraft, guidance, and mending at will, plus offensive spells twice per day.
test_queries: versatile swamp spellcaster with poison abilities
lizardfolk shaman that supports allies and controls battlefield
humanoid creature with significant spellcasting and poison tactics
poisonous humanoid in swamps with strong perception skills
shaman with unique poison and healing spells
